name: CGPDFDocument
desc: A document that contains PDF (Portable Document Format) drawing information.

items.name: init?(CGDataProvider)
items.desc: Creates a Core Graphics PDF document using a data provider.

items.name: init?(CFURL)
items.desc: Creates a Core Graphics PDF document using data specified by a URL.

items.name: var catalog: CGPDFDictionaryRef?
items.desc: Returns the document catalog of a Core Graphics PDF document.

items.name: var fileIdentifier: CGPDFArrayRef?
items.desc: Gets the file identifier for a PDF document.

items.name: var info: CGPDFDictionaryRef?
items.desc: Gets the information dictionary for a PDF document.

items.name: var numberOfPages: Int
items.desc: Returns the number of pages in a PDF document.

items.name: func getVersion(majorVersion: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int32>, minorVersion: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int32>)
items.desc: Returns the major and minor version numbers of a Core Graphics PDF document.

items.name: func page(at: Int) -> CGPDFPage?
items.desc: Returns a page from a Core Graphics PDF document.

items.name: var isEncrypted: Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the specified PDF file is encrypted.

items.name: var allowsCopying: Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the specified PDF document allows copying.

items.name: var allowsPrinting: Bool
items.desc: Returns whether a PDF document allows printing.

items.name: var isUnlocked: Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the specified PDF document is currently unlocked.

items.name: func unlockWithPassword(UnsafePointer<CChar>) -> Bool
items.desc: Unlocks an encrypted PDF document when a valid password is supplied.

items.name: class var typeID: CFTypeID
items.desc: Returns the type identifier for Core Graphics PDF documents.
